bug.author: ianhellstrom
bug.summary: Keep version fixed when searching API docs
bug.description:
When using the search bar in the <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.13/api_docs/python/tf>API docs</denchmark-link> with a version in the URL, any search will include pages from different API versions, which means you often end up in the wrong module and have to click on the correct version . <denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Go to: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.13/api_docs/python/tf Type in 'unsorted_segment_' and wait for the results to appear (see image) Choose the top 'Pages' result You're now in the 1.9 API rather than 1.13.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49023008/57705141-8d8a4600-7663-11e9-8640-5a3fdde51ae8.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ianhellstrom>@ianhellstrom</denchmark-link> I see 1.13.1 on top of the results. Could you check again or let me know if I am making any mistake. Here is the screenshot. Thanks! unsorted_segment_ <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46058173/58223447-8819a500-7cce-11e9-827a-d1ce53a8111a.png></denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ianhellstrom>@ianhellstrom</denchmark-link> Automatically closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ianhellstrom>@ianhellstrom</denchmark-link>
We've hidden all the old versions of the docs from search. We've also moved most of the old versions off the site, Into <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/tree/r1.9/site/en/api_docs>branches on the tensorflow_docs repository</denchmark-link> . So I think this is fixed.
